_header: Thy wicked deeds thee brought to care
_description: Lines in a story from the Gesta Romanorum — twelve couplets

BLHar7322.First Lines:
Þi wycked dedis þe brohte to carebot if þe for
                    ȝom þou sinne no mare…
BLHar7322.Last Lines:
…Hereof take þe to my spouse& ȝiue þe Ioye
                    land & house
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
EETS
         o.s. 15 (1866); repr. 1962; rev. ed. 1903: 258-9.
